name: Bravium
description: Bravium is an epic Hero Defense adventure RPG. Equip your heroes with mighty weapons and items, control powerful magic spells. And don't forget about the cabbages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Athlon 64/Pentium 4 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6 series/Radeon X1300 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
